channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical Ltd. -- subiquity
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical Ltd. -- subiquity

item.title: CVE-2023-5182|2024-09-19T16:41:29.487Z -- canonical%20ltd. -- subiquity
item.description: Sensitive data could be exposed in logs of subiquity version 23.09.1 and earlier. An attacker in the adm group could use this information to find hashed passwords and possibly escalate their privilege.
